attr.title: Exile Squadron
attr.desc: Exile Squadron is an action-packed, sidescrolling shoot 'em up, inspired by the classics of the genre. As part of an elite fighter group, you will be granted a huge variety of upgradeable weapons, which you can use to stop the invading Colonial forces. Destroy your enemies as fast as possible, collect points, and put your highscore on the online leaderboard.
attr.inst: Purchase the game on Steam or Itch.io and copy game files into the assets folder.
